headline.main: Plan to Reduce Medicare Drug Costs Is Withdrawn After Bipartisan Criticism

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

snippet: More than 300 House members expressed concern about the proposal, which would have used reimbursement formulas different from those in federal Medicare law....
lead_paragraph: More than 300 House members expressed concern about the proposal, which would have used reimbursement formulas different from those in federal Medicare law.
